website_summaries.verdict: A stellar value for such a quality microfiber towel.
pros: This versatile towel is perfect for drying, cleaning, wiping, and buffing exterior paint
The lint-free fabric is industrial grade and 100-percent machine washable
Each towel is color-coded for different parts of your car — use one for paint buffing, one for metal polishing, one for leather, and another for wheels
cons: The seams at the corner of each towel may fray over time

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for multi surface cleaning !
customer_reviews.text: These towels are great and serve their purpose, in cleaning your vehicle. My fiancé is a car fanatic and I bought these are part of a car cleaning kit, for Christmas. These towels are great for multi surface cleaning: your dashboard, inside the doors, the touch screen, windows, seats.. You name it and these towels work well with no smudges and top notch absorbency !
customer_reviews.author: Felici

customer_reviews.title: Good interior microfibers
customer_reviews.text: These may be good microfiber towels but the are also the most expensive to be found anywhere on the internet. Also, certainly made in china, equipped with cheap chinese packaging as well. These are not for drying your vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: dmiami123

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for interiors
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for an interior specific MF towel. This one did not disappoint. Soft yet low cut so it will buff out anything i apply on my interior. I have used them to buff out excess of 3 products. Interior cleaner which i apply with a leather brush to my seats and leather as well plastic conditioner/protectant. Both of which i apply with MF applicator bars and wipe off with this rag.
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTIAN GOMEZ

customer_reviews.title: Like these so far
customer_reviews.text: I like these towels. Haven’t washed them yet so I’m not sure what will happen once they’re washed. I’ve owne other brands that seem to seize up. Only thing that bugged me was the tag on them. I know it’s nice to know the brand and all, but it’s a little plastic like tag that kind of takes away from the softeness, but easy to remove so won’t call it a deal breaker. Just seems like they’d know not to add that, but oh well. Will be buying more if washing them goes well.
customer_reviews.author: M. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Good for hair!
customer_reviews.text: These arent really big enough for drying hair, but they still get the job done! I would strongly suggest getting bigger ones, especially if you have longer hair (mine's only about shoulder length and is curly), but again, still does great. :)
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Chemical Guys Microfiber Towels
customer_reviews.text: nice and absorbent. not to large or small and serves purpose. does not scratch metal or glass but be careful if using on soft windows, I've not checked to see if it may scratch but I have something to resolve this issue if needed. RECOMMEND this product.
customer_reviews.author: bluegrasspioneer fan

customer_reviews.title: Nice towels
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to cover up my rv skylights and door windows. Added a couple velcro squares to the corners to hold in place when needing to darken the place up for better sleep and privacy.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S.

customer_reviews.title: Work well for waxing the car
customer_reviews.text: They apply well and clean up well too. I just washed them in a bucket. I wouldn't throw them in my washer after waxing the car.
customer_reviews.author: mitchellm

customer_reviews.title: Great towels
customer_reviews.text: I loathe buying towels like this, you'd think something in your house, like an old sweatshirt can be repurposed for your cleaning needs. However, these are great towels for cleaning your car. I can't speak to how long they will last, but for the price, this is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: iLoveStats

customer_reviews.title: It’s microfiber cloths so not much to say
customer_reviews.text: These arrived quickly, they are a good size, they don’t leave lint behind and they are good for what I purchased them for (wiping my shoes dry after hand cleaning them). They also held up well in the washing machine and drying. I’d purchase again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: RedGalStr8

customer_reviews.title: Good cloth, but not black. More of a navy color
customer_reviews.text: Towels itself are soft and microfiber , but they are definitely not "black" so I was dissappointed for what I needed them for. These are more of a dark navy. I used a photo for reference as I'm wearing navy jeans and a black t-shirt and they are definitely the same color as the jeans.
customer_reviews.author: JUSTIN HAMMOND

customer_reviews.title: These microfiber towels smell like they were doused in chemicals and shipped straight to ...
customer_reviews.text: The chemical in Chemical Guys is no joke. These microfiber towels smell like they were doused in chemicals and shipped straight to my door. No amount of washing them has been able to get the stench out.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Fast Shipping and great seller
customer_reviews.text: Towels are super soft and clean up my new car great. I have washed them and used them a couple of times and they have been holding up great!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Really Good Towels
customer_reviews.text: I really like these microfiber towels! They make removing the Soft99 Fusso coat easy; they absorb a lot of water, etc. They're perfect for detailing cars.
customer_reviews.author: ye rim kim

customer_reviews.title: Price
customer_reviews.text: Price is too high for this picture is different then they look
customer_reviews.author: Sadaf Aamir

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Towels
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the best detail/cleaning/drying towels I have. Very thick and durable, but soft and absorbent. Highly recommend. I have atleast 12 of them now!
customer_reviews.author: Clay

customer_reviews.title: They worked good still its time to wash them
customer_reviews.text: they have so much black dye when you wash them. Cant wash with any other towels becuase it ruins them i only have three but not worth the water just to wash them alone so they dont stain anymore of my better towels
customer_reviews.author: Cesar Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Not color fast
customer_reviews.text: Turned all my other towels grayish due to dye leaking out on first wash
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Chemical guys=car gurus!!!
customer_reviews.text: chemical guys are just the best around. wish the pack would include one big towel and 3 small but for this price you cant complain.
customer_reviews.author: Frank G

customer_reviews.title: you can get a pack of 12 at harbor freight for like 4 bucks and they are the same quality just ...
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I expected high quality microfiber towels but they are OK nothing crazy about them, you can get a pack of 12 at harbor freight for like 4 bucks and they are the same quality just these are black. But they get the job done so I can't complain about them.
customer_reviews.author: victor

customer_reviews.title: Good Towels
customer_reviews.text: I am using these towels in the gym and they work well for that purpose. I give 4 stars instead of 5 only because the texture feels a bit awkward against the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Alex K.

customer_reviews.title: Far superior to microfiber towels you can buy at a local ...
customer_reviews.text: Far superior to microfiber towels you can buy at a local auto store, highly recommended. When washing microfiber towels, just make sure to use liquid soap, no fabric softener, and dry on low heat.
customer_reviews.author: SF

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: Very rough - almost crusty. Also nothing to define it as chemical bro’s brand. Might as well have just bought the generic ones at the store. Cleaned windows well enough. I just expected more.
customer_reviews.author: 3vilToilet

customer_reviews.title: Very good product!
customer_reviews.text: Works great to clean up face paint and glitter! Plus it doesn’t look all stained like my old ones and helps me keep looking clean and professional!
customer_reviews.author: Jesica

customer_reviews.title: Great for cleaning granite or other delicate surfaces
customer_reviews.text: My kitchen has black granite counter top and black sink so wanted some microfiber cloths that would blend in with the kitchen but also be gentle enough to clean my fridge and granite. They were huge so I've cut them in half and they're working out so far.
customer_reviews.author: LJJDayton

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great chemical guys product. I use it to clean plastic pieces on the exterior and interior of my car!
customer_reviews.author: Ivan M

customer_reviews.title: Nice towel, wrong color
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a quality towel based on first appearances. But I ordered black towels and received dark blue towels.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron A.

customer_reviews.title: Good, but you get more towels the same as other CG towels-Blue
customer_reviews.text: I like these, but they are no better than other less expensive Griot or CG towels. Have held up trough several washings.
customer_reviews.author: M. Belken

customer_reviews.title: Not Black
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is good. However if you’re looking for a black cloth, these are indeed more of a Navy Blue. I’m specifically looking for black cloth for my boat, and will be requesting a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: They do the job good, I bought 3 different type of microfiber towels, and these were my favorite ones to use while washing my cars, they did a better job, I've had better but these are reliable
customer_reviews.author: Erik Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great microfiber cloths, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great microfiber cloths! Much thinker than what you find in the discount stores. I love them and will definately buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great towel
customer_reviews.text: Does the job, no scratches , feels great, down side is it’s black so U can’t see the dirt
customer_reviews.author: michael qi

customer_reviews.title: Great for prosumer espresso machine care
customer_reviews.text: Extremely soft fabric. I use these for purging my steam wand and daily cleanup of the espresso machine after use. Doesn't scuff the stainless steel polish. Great cloth.
customer_reviews.author: P120D1GY

customer_reviews.title: A good and fine cloth.
customer_reviews.text: A very fine cloth. Good for cleaning glass surfaces, especially electronics displays inside cars that tend to get dusty.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Rosenthal

customer_reviews.title: No streaks, absorbs well and dries fast.
customer_reviews.text: Great value and quality. No streaks, absorbs well and dries fast.
customer_reviews.author: anteres

customer_reviews.title: Cloth it up
customer_reviews.text: These were great Cloths and I will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Jerrad

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Cleaning towel.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing cleans my sunglasses better. Also great for laptop screens.
customer_reviews.author: Ernie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great towels, perfect size to keep in the pocket for personal use during work or other physical activities.
customer_reviews.author: Kai's Daddy

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Microfiber Towels
customer_reviews.text: You can definitely feel the quality and tell the difference between these microfiber towels and towels I've purchased at local retail locations. Highly recommend these microfiber towels.
customer_reviews.author: RF

customer_reviews.title: Love these towels!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these towels for glass cleaning and dusting. The dust and dirts clings to them and they allow me to clean glass without windex or streaking.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ashpaugh

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love it.. Little swirl marks . Careful when putting it for washing, ensure you are not putting it in the dryer. Just let it air dry
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good and does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Dry clothes. Pretty good, I wish they dried a little better.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice color!
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty and great color! I got the blue/black color, i love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Great for general car cleaning, best use on both car's exterior and interior.
customer_reviews.text: It can removes mild to moderate sticky dirt on cars body (with water) and dust on the interior.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Navy blue
customer_reviews.text: Was expecting black but after a first wash they turned navy blue.
customer_reviews.author: Che

customer_reviews.title: Great towels for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: These towels are very durable last long And clean off very well when washed.
customer_reviews.author: joe ovalle

customer_reviews.title: Great towels for cleaning traditional hand tools
customer_reviews.text: I love these towels I use them at my sharpening station for wiping down my hand planes and they work wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Clay Yeagley

customer_reviews.title: Holds an incredible amount of water!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for not the intended purpose but had a large spill I had to clean up and remembered I had them. I'm extremely impressed!! my portable washer dumped about a water bottles worth of water on my bathroom floor and ONE towel soaked up nearly all of it without having to squeeze the water out of it. needless to say I'll be keeping them handy now for this reason.
customer_reviews.author: Bagunbits

customer_reviews.title: Weird material
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the material. It sticks to my skin. Feels weird.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Great cloth!
customer_reviews.text: Found my new microfiber supplier! Excellent product and price point!
customer_reviews.author: aka_threads

customer_reviews.title: Walmart has better towels for about 1/2 the price
customer_reviews.text: I ordered black and got navy blue. When I used the towels there was lint everywhere. Walmart has better towels for about 1/2 the price. I wouldn't buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Spyda

product_meta.title: Chemical Guys MIC35303 Workhorse Professional Grade Microfiber Towel, Black (16 in. x 16 in.) (Pack of 3)
product_meta.description: Color:Black| Size:16 in x 16 in| Style:3 PackThe Black Workhorse Towel is a professional grade microfiber towel. It is designed to withstand thousands of washes. This towel is a premium lint-free industrial grade towel. The Workhorse line comes in six colors, making it easy to color-coordinate your towels. Use the same color towels on the same type of jobs. The last thing you want is to use a dressing towel on your windows or a wheel and rim towel to clean your interior leather. Chemical Guys Workhorse Microfiber Towels are color coded for different areas across your car. Cross-contamination is an amateur mistake: using an engine bay towel on interiors could stain and ruin leather surfaces; dressing residue can streak on glass; brake dust stuck in wheel towels can scratch and swirl paint. Use the Chemical Guys/Smart Detailing University Color Coding Scheme for perfect results.
feature_bullets: Will not shed or lose fibers

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,396 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
